Dear David

One of the best bibliographies on Japanese language titles is t=
o be 
found in the Haynes and Burawoy  '100 Selected Tsuba from European 
P=
ublic Collections'. A special, numbered edition of this book included 
a 'c=
omplete bibliography of publications on the subject of sword 
fittings from=
 1693 to (the date of publication in) September 1984'.  
This includes almo=
st 400 titles, listed in the language of 
publication, the degree of specia=
lisation and the type of publication.

Sadly it contains no publications af=
ter 1984, of course.

Regards, John L.
